title: Solar Orbiter Radio and Plasma Wave, Level 2 Low Frequency Receiver (LFR) Averaged Spectral Matrix (ASM) Data in Survey Mode

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch_F0' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/rpw/science/l2/lfr-surv-asm/2020/solo_l2_rpw-lfr-surv-asm_20200615_v05.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 22.5000% of the 18 timesteps. Cadence = 3999960960 [ns] = PT3.999961S.

parameters.name: ASM_RE_F0
parameters.description: [NO PLOT/LIST] All the real part of the 5x5 calibrated matrices for all bins of F0 sampling frequency in the SCM B1-B2-B3 axis system frame (ASF).
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Real part of the spectral matrices for F0

bins.name: F0
bins.description: Sampling frequency of ASM at F0

parameters.name: ASM_RE_F0_ASF_SPEC
parameters.description: |---> spectrogram, autocorrelated values.. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['ASM_RE_F0']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Real part of the spectral matrices for F0

bins.description: Sampling frequency of ASM at F0
